name: The Gassy Scotsman
description:
THERE IS NOTHING FLAPPY ABOUT THIS SCOTSMAN BUT HIS KILT!

The Gassy Scotsman is now available for your Android Device!

 - TAP YOUR SCREEN to let loose a Blast of Ass Gas!

 - NAVIGATE through the maze of Cabers!

 - HOW LONG can you stay in the air on Ass Gas Alone?!

 - BEAT YOUR HIGH SCORE!

... and as an added bonus, you also get the FART MACHINE App FREE!

 - 8 Wet Fart Sounds!

 - 3 Squeaky Fart Sounds!

 - GUARANTEED to liven up any Work Meeting or Family Function! 

WHAT ARE YOU WAITING FOR, LADDIE?!

KILT UP AND GIVE THE OL' GASSY SCOTSMAN A GO 'ROUND TODAY!
